data.eml:eml: First description of the female of Lysiteles minimus (Araneae: Thomisidae) from Liupan Mountains, Ningxia, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hu, Dong-Sheng, Zhang, Feng (2011): First description of the female of Lysiteles minimus (Araneae: Thomisidae) from Liupan Mountains, Ningxia, China. Zootaxa 3013: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204776
